document.heading: Special Election Reform Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-167, the “Special Election Reform Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-611. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on, Jul. 14, 2014, and Sept. 23, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Oct. 7, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-440 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-167 became effective on Mar. 3, 2015.
